title: incorrect doc for regexp/#Regexp.ReplaceAll
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Read the documentation for ReplaceAll on
http://golang.org/pkg/regexp/#Regexp.ReplaceAll

What is the expected output?
ReplaceAll returns a copy of src, replacing matches of the Regexp with the replacement
byte slice repl.

What do you see instead?
ReplaceAll returns a copy of src, replacing matches of the Regexp with the replacement
string repl.

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
Build version go1.0.1.

Please provide any additional information below.
The documentation should state that repl is a byte slice and not a string.
